720573f-a.text:
Hudson Street, west side, at Charles Street, showing at the S. W. corner, Meyer's Pharmacy. Note the early overhead sign board advertising Soverign Cigarettes.
Circa 1900
J. J. Corell, photo
P. L. Sperr Collection
